entries.title: Yuan Likely to Weaken Modestly, Gradually by End-2024, HSBC Says
entries.description: The Chinese yuan is likely to weaken modestly and gradually by end-2024, HSBC said.

entries.title: Hong Kong Shares Edge Higher as Investors Weigh PMI Data
entries.description: Hong Kong’s Hang Seng Index rose 0.1% to 18422.20, erasing early losses.

entries.title: Oil Falls as OPEC Plans Fuel Supply Concerns
entries.description: Oil fell in early Asian trade amid supply concerns. These come after OPEC laid out plans over the weekend to remove some voluntary cuts earlier than expected, the ANZ Research team said.

entries.title: More »
entries.description: It began with a LinkedIn message—she seemed polite and attractive. It turned into a nightmare that cost him everything.

entries.title: The Goal forChina's Chip Giant: Cut Out the U.S.
entries.description: Hit by Washington’s export controls, China’s domestic chip industry strives for self-sufficiency.

entries.title: America's Commute to Work Is Getting Longer and Longer
entries.description: Drives to the office that take over an hour are becoming more common—and even more palatable.

entries.title: Merrick Garland, Three Special Counsels and a Justice Department Under Fire
entries.description: The attorney general has tried to stay above the political fray while overseeing investigations into Trump, Biden and his son.

entries.title: JGBs Rise, Tracking Overnight Gains in U.S. Treasurys
entries.description: JGBs rose in the morning Tokyo session, tracking overnight gains in U.S. Treasurys.

entries.title: Gold Steady, Underpinned by Prospects Of U.S. Growth Slowdown
entries.description: Gold was steady in the early Asian session, underpinned by prospects of a U.S. economic growth slowdown, spurred by weaker-than-expected U.S. May ISM manufacturing PMI released overnight.

entries.title: Biden to Issue Executive Order on Southern Border, Limiting Asylum
entries.description: The order, which President Biden plans to sign alongside several mayors from southern-border communities, aims to restrict the flow of migrants over the border.

entries.title: Australian Consumer Confidence, Inflation Expectations Nudge Higher
entries.description: Australian consumer confidence was slightly higher last week, but sentiment remains depressed, stuck well below long-term averages now for more than two years.

entries.title: South Korea's Inflation Slows to 10-Month Low in May
entries.description: South Korea’s headline inflation slowed to a 10-month low but still remained above the central bank’s 2.0% target, likely reinforcing views that the bank is in no rush to start easing its monetary policy.

entries.title: LaVie Care, Large Nursing Home Operator, Files for Repeat Bankruptcy
entries.description: The case is the latest involving healthcare providers tied to real-estate investment trusts.

entries.title: Hunter Biden's Trial: Crack Cocaine, a Colt Cobra Revolver and an Alleged Lie
entries.description: A jury of six men and six women were chosen on Monday.

entries.title: Scammers Tried to Sell Graceland. How to Prevent Your Home From Being Next.
entries.description: Even if you don’t lose your property, title fraud can have real consequences.

entries.title: Corrections & Amplifications
entries.description: Corrections & Amplifications for the edition of June 4, 2024

entries.title: Firm Retention Summary: Rue21
entries.description: This is a summary of a request from Rue21 to hire Willkie Farr & Gallagher as co-counsel, filed May 9 with the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Delaware.

entries.title: E*Trade Considers Kicking Meme-Stock Leader Keith Gill Off Platform
entries.description: Morgan Stanley’s trading platform discusses concerns about possible manipulation in GameStop.

entries.title: Netanyahu Signals Openness to Cease-Fire but Wants Option to Resume Fighting
entries.description: The Israeli leader showed cautious support for initiative from President Biden, but his position runs counter to demands by Hamas for a lasting cease-fire that secures the group’s survival.

entries.title: New Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Filings -- Week Ending June 3, 2024
entries.description: A list of some new chapter 11 bankruptcy filings made during the last week.
